A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Let me start by saying that I am 41\, a huge fan of the original trilogy\, like Star Wars Rebels * enjoyed Rogue One. 
Saying that\, The Last Jedi is an horrific "Star Wars" film. Horrific that it seems to purposely break every rule that made this franchise what it is & seemingly it does it defiantly with a middle finger up to everybody that has invested money or interested in the franchise. 
The characters were poorly thought through\, even established favourites like Luke Skywalker & Leia Organa bore very little resemblance to the characters we got to know in all of the previous films. 
The story is so poor\, I have to wonder how long it actually took Mr Johnson to write it as none of the original storylines or character traits were used in this film.
Personally\, after this mess\, I will invest no more money in DIsney's version of Star Wars as they have made it abundantly clear that they do not value me as a viewer or customer.
